head.title: Perform Case-Sensitive Searches in {{FileFormatUp}} with {{EnvNameShort}}
head.description: The {{ProdFullName}} API allows {{ProgLang}} developers to execute case-sensitive searches across different document types.

header.title: Case-Sensitive Search
header.description: {{ProdFullName}} lets you easily implement advanced case-sensitive search functionality in your {{EnvNameShort}} applications.
header.subtitle: {{ProdFullName}}

about.title: What is {{ProdShortName}}?
about.content: [{{ProdFullName}}]({{PlatformLink}}) is a powerful library for searching and indexing text in documents. It supports over 70 formats, including PDFs, Word, Excel, images, and ZIP files, enabling efficient handling of large amounts of data.

more_features.title: Key Features for Document Search and Indexing
more_features.description: With {{ProdFullName}}, you can easily search and index text in over 70 file formats. Access and organize information effortlessly using advanced search tools.

feature_1.title: Comprehensive Text Search
feature_1.content: Find text in various document types like PDFs, Word files, and spreadsheets. Use options such as exact matches, fuzzy searches, and wildcards for accurate results.

feature_2.title: Efficient Data Indexing
feature_2.content: Create and manage indexes to speed up searches. Indexing helps you organize and quickly locate data in large document collections.

feature_3.title: Supports Multiple Languages
feature_3.content: Search documents in over 80 languages with support for diverse keyboard layouts and word variations, ensuring accurate search results.

feature_4.title: Customizable Search Settings
feature_4.content: Adjust search settings, including case sensitivity, date filters, and exclusion of specific terms or data during indexing.

formats.title: Compatible Document Formats
formats.description: {{ProdShortName}} supports over 70 document formats. Customize your search options and save time with indexing.

operations.title: Key Functionalities
operations.description: Explore advanced features for fast and precise document searching.

examples.comment_1: Specify the path for the index folder
examples.comment_2: Set the folder containing the documents to search
examples.comment_3: Enable case-sensitive search in the settings
